I have reproduced this on Vista/ IE7. We are also seeing this on XP/IE7. I
have engaged the engineering team on this issue.

I'll update this item when I have news.

Hello,

This issue is should be resolved with the site redesign.

Regards, Chris Tsai, Support

artifacts.description:
This problem occurs with IE 7, Windows Vista:
On the project's public info page (for example:
https://domain.net/project/admin/public_info.php?group_id=258655), the text boxes next to "Descriptive Name" and "Project Description" are not aligned properly; see the screenshot attached.
artifacts.summary: ENGR: Public Info page not displayed properly
